reviews.review: this game has ruined my life

What can i say about this game. This game makes me VERY sad and helps me forgot the reality of this cruel world. Getting chased by some sicko killer really helps me deal with my insecurities and hanging on the hook makes me realize I have some friends who will try and save me. When I feel like an asshole i will play killer and either dominate and make them my bitches or get fucking railed by survivors with a 9000 volt battery flashlight burning the living hell out of my eyes. Overall i guess this game is alright.
I may have 5 hours, but i have almost 2,000 on xbox. Its fun at times, also bad. Overall I would rate this game 6.7/10. It not special, but its alright at times
This game is actually shit, please do not buy it and become a member of the dbd community, society already has enough cretins. Buying this game should be a cardinal sin.

I heard about this game on YouTube and Discord, as well as through some friends. I decided to take a look at it, sure that it was going to suck. 
I was entirely mistaken. This is easily one of the best multiplayer games I have ever played. Sure, it has flaws, but they are minor in my opinion. I wasn't aware of a lot of the game's elements, such as the massive number of characters to play as. I'm a Killer main, and I am loving the new Legion rework. The music really adds to the gameplay, the soundtrack is absolutely fantastic. The only downside is many Perks become "meta" and everyone uses them, but this is easily fixable by making minor adjustments to their effects. That or just adapt instead of complaining to the developers. 
I look forward to the future of this game, and hope that Springtrap eventually join us in the Fog.

After playing this game for 1400 hours, and seen the game change drastically over the past couple years, this game has it upsides and it's downsides. When I first purchased this game late 2019, the game was at a good playable state and was extremely addicting and I would play it 24/7 and was my go to game to play when I was bored, but this has changed. New players won't have the same experience as I had because now everything is meta. Almost every survivor runs the same perks, same with killers as well, there's no fun in seeing the same thing over and over again. "So if you don't enjoy the game, why do you play it??", because it is still addicting, I can safely jump on this game in the morning when I wake up and not get bored of it at all, despite how frustrating this game can be at times, there's nothing better then getting the flashlight save that will save your teammate, nothing better then shitting on a swf team as killer when they were being toxic the entire game, or finding the hatch when all your teammates have died. Sure I slammed my desk a couple of times, and the teabags and flashlight clicks and garbage teammates may get to me sometimes, but I still highly HIGHLY recommend this game to anybody who wants to find a new game to play. BUT BE WARNED, if you are deciding to dedicate a lot of time to this game, EXPECT A LOT OF GARBAGE TEAMMATES, TOXIC KILLERS, TOXIC SURVIVORS, FACE CAMPING etc. If you can handle this stuff, then you will not be disappointed with what's in store for you. Thank you for reading :)

Dead by Daylight has got to have the most sad Development team along side the most Toxic community that gets butthurt when they don’t get they’re way.

The whole game is literally ridiculous. The devs are to lazy to fix anything and when they say they’ll fix something it doesn’t happen until a few months later.

Every update is just a huge waste of time because they fix old bugs but provide new ones. They also have a tendency of nerfing and buffing killers and perks (For Both Survivor and Killer) that literally do not need any changes. And the only reason they ever do that is because some lame ass Streamer was crying on twitch because they played bad one game and blamed a perk/item for a game that didn’t go their way.

I personally don’t even get why this game isn’t free either because if you do want some more fun perks to mess around with you either have to play a good 40 games to collect a currency called Iridescent Shards so that you can spend them in the Shrine of Secrets or just spend your hard earned cash on dlc packs. 

In all honesty though I wouldn’t recommend giving this company any money because they are literally so brain dead it’s not even funny. They just care about making cosmetics and making a stupid update for maps. They call it a “Graphical Update”. Basically they waste their money and time on updates that focus on making the games looks more appealing to new players instead of fixing current issues then they make cosmetics or new lame character updates/ Dlc packs. They’re pushing old veteran players away and trying way to hard on bringing new players into the game.

SWFs are fun. Solo queues can go either way, depending on the team. On both the killer AND survivor side, your ability to be OP relies just as much on craftiness as it does the perk build you use. The community itself can be toxic, but the same could be said about any other multiplayer online game. Don't whine or take things too seriously and you'll have a good time. The devs couldn't care less whether you're being tunneled or camped.

出色的游戏设计，优秀的机制，身临其境的感觉，非常优秀。但，时间久了，会感觉重复枯燥，即使是杀手，徽章配件系统并不会给游戏带来非常大的趣味性，反而血点升级等级非常缓慢。
对于屠夫来说，几乎总是面对幸存者玩家相同的技能，下一局、下一局再下一局，依然是那五六个技能，虽然技能有七页。
